description: Blaino Boxers were very hostile fighters, what with their violent flurry of punches. After years of training with proffesional Labrynnians, Blaino Boxers could muster up enough force to knock the living daylights out of their targets,
tooltip: Blaino Boxers were very hostile fighters, what with their violent flurry of punches. After years of training with proffesional Labrynnians, Blaino Boxers could muster up enough force to knock the living daylights out of their targets. (Blaino Boxers now deal Knockback damage)
